bookingLocations.title: bookingLocations
bookingLocations.description: A list of booking locations that were found with based on the input parameters. May be 1 or more records. Use these to provide more information to the user and ask if they would like to select a specific location to set.

errorMessage.title: errorMessage
errorMessage.description: The error or system message returned by the action. Follow the instructions and display a generalised message to the user.
